repository_verification_status.summary: Classification of repositories based on their proximity to the core Metagit ecosystem and the trust level of their internal tooling.

status_levels.PRE_VERIFIED: Core Metagit repos (gem, memory) with signed releases and audited scripts.
status_levels.EXPERIMENTAL: Active development repos with trusted authors but non-standardized tooling.
status_levels.UNVERIFIED: Historical, imported, or legacy repos whose internal scripts must be manually assessed before execution.
